verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them,

and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H8085>'Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1889>'Aha!<s%>' <S%H413>against<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H2490>profaned,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H8074>made<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H1473>exile,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H5414>give<s%> you to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> and they will <S%H3427>set<s%> their <S%H2918>encampments<s%> among you and <S%H5414>make<s%> their <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> among you; they will <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> a <S%H5116>pasture<s%> for <S%H1581>camels<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> a <S%H4769>resting<s%> <S%H4769>place<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks.<s%> Thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

'For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have <S%H4222>clapped<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H7554>stamped<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7589>scorn<s%> of your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you for <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> And I shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> you <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and make you perish from the <S%H6>lands;<s%> I shall <S%H776>destroy<s%> you. Thus you will <S%H8045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3045>Lord.<s%> "

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is like <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%>'

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6605>deprive<s%> the <S%H3802>flank<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> of [its] <S%H5892>cities,<s%> of its <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are on its <S%H7097>frontiers,<s%> the <S%H9469>glory<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon, and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> <S%H5921>along<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> may not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
"Thus I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> has <S%H6213>acted<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by <S%H5358>taking<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and has <S%H816>incurred<s%> <S%H816>grievous<s%> <S%H816>guilt,<s%> and <S%H5358>avenged<s%> themselves upon them,"

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will also <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it. And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H2723>waste;<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman<s%> even to <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> they will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> My <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H9000>Edom<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Therefore, they will <S%H6213>act<s%> in <S%H9000>Edom<s%> according to My <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to My <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> thus they will <S%H3045>know<s%> My <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6213>acted<s%> in <S%H5360>revenge<s%> and have <S%H5358>taken<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> with <S%H7589>scorn<s%> of <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H342>enmity,<s%>"

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> even <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and destroy the <S%H6>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7611>seacoast.<s%> <S%H3220><s%>

"And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them with <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H9640>rebukes;<s%> and they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> when I <S%H5414>lay<s%> My <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them."' "
